thumb.title: 【音内つらら】リトルマイワールド【UTAUカバー/+UST】
thumb.description: Hello, I'm riot3121. More than 30 songs were found yesterday, so I decided to make a cover to one of them - little my world by Negapi. The PV is pretty silly and cute, so I made tsurara's voice cute too (with putting a -15 gender flag). My friend kurokyu made 2 covers too, you also can check him Sorry for: Instrumental. It was AI off-vocaled not ideally, so you can slightly hear miku's voice too Instrumental quality. Because, it is a reprint from Youku, don't expect ideal sound quality Not making original PV. I want to release it fastly (+ I'm lazy), so oh! Not releasing a tabitsura compilation. Sorry, I'm hardly get motivation, but I'm still working on it ._. Original song by: ねがぴ - sm13542442 / https://youtu.be/5KYw82Dkm-E Voicebank used: Otouchi Tsurara "Miyuki" (A3 tone only) UST (in case, if the link would be removed, contact me at twitter on at comments): https://www.mediafire.com/file/lcu74in5mv8fe75/Little_My_World_-_UST.zip/file Have a good time!
